name: Coveny Town
description:
Collect resources, decorate your house, break chest locks, explore the forest and rebuild the town of Coveny in this small but ambitious game for the SGB jam!

Some game features:

* Day-Night system with real-time lightning

* Use your magic lamp to light your way in the darkest nights!

* NPCs have different behaviors depending on the time of day! 

* Find treasures by digging with a shovel!

* Enemies that appear during the night!

* Turn-order system!

* Mini-games to open chests and collect stone!

* Quest and events that only happen at a certain time of day!

* Make trees grow with magic!

And more!

Playtime:

2 hours Approximately

Notes

* For those who are curious, I did everything in SGB except for the lighting system and automatic text skipping, where I used unity exporter for sgb.

* Please excuse the English of the game!
